input:
An office downtown had a red carpet. The office staff complained it was always dirty. But none of their vacuums could properly clean it. So they hired a professional carpet cleaner. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- It ended up dirtier than it was before.
- The carpet looked almost new after it was cleaned.
answer_choices: It ended up dirtier than it was before.
The carpet looked almost new after it was cleaned.
target: The carpet looked almost new after it was cleaned.

input:
Rene was at the arcade with a couple of friends on a Friday night. He was getting ready to play a game but realized he forgot his wallet. His friend Jack noticed this and offered to let him borrow money. Rene appreciated his offer and took him up on it. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Rene told his friend to leave him alone.
- Rene then played games.
answer_choices: Rene told his friend to leave him alone.
Rene then played games.
target: Rene then played games.

input:
Jim is a new driver and has never been pulled over before. Yesterday he was pulled over for speeding. The officer explained to him why he was being given a ticket. Jim will have to work overtime to pay for the ticket. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jim is very upset.
- Jim was happy to see the officer.
answer_choices: Jim is very upset.
Jim was happy to see the officer.
target: Jim is very upset.
